about_the_game:
An adventure in a near-future city awaits you!
In an open world where artificial intelligence coexists with humans, you will face the unknown while forging deep connections with the city's residents. Experience various activities and interact with the people in the city. Each resident has their own unique story, and your interactions with them will greatly impact the progression of the game and its narrative. Solving their problems and cooperating with them can also influence the safety of the city.

Exciting opportunities await!
Discover hidden casinos where you can try your luck, opening unexpected opportunities and new paths. Take part in activities like managing a café, playing basketball, tennis, or enjoying game rooms. Steam achievements and leaderboards add to the thrill of your adventure.

Beware of lurking dangers!
Zombies and mysterious monsters hide in the shadows. In the underground dungeons of the city, you will occasionally face these threats. Sometimes, epic battles unfold, leading to new adventures and encounters depending on the story and events.

Create your own story!
Explore a world full of freedom and challenges, and embark on countless adventures that are uniquely yours.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has an element in which the player can choose violent actions (punching, shooting) against NPCs, zombies, and aliens. Shooting zombies and aliens produces a slight green spray of blood, but there is no excessive gore or blood, and the violent content is subdued. These violent behaviors are not mandatory and are left to the player's choice. Players can also choose to avoid violent behavior and proceed peacefully, which does not affect the storyline.

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires SSD.
